snippet.title: Research and Development Mod Trailer
snippet.description:
I am not affiliated with the developer(s) of this mod. 

According to the mod's ModDB page, "Research and Development is a puzzle-centric mod for Half-Life 2: Episode Two featuring an unarmed player but plenty of violent mayhem." 

Research and Development requires Half-Life 2 Episode Two to play, and you can get it at http://www.moddb.com/mods/research-and-development
